reviewText: I have 4 of the Heidi Songs sight word DVDs and love them. I use them daily in my kindergarten classroom. I purchased this DVD for our unit on shapes and am extremely disappointed. The circle song points to the moon, sun, and a ball, which are all SPHERES, not circles. This is a common misconception with young children attempting to differentiate between 2D and 3D shapes and I was not pleased that this DVD reinforces this misunderstanding rather than helping to correct it.
Catchy songs that help children remember different types of shapes.  My daughter loves the video.  It's cute.
My son loves these! He knows how to read all his sight words and had learned so much more. His teacher has the set and they do them in school.
I love this dvd it has really helped my 2 yrs old learn and stay engaged
